duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop new agency relationships and grow existing ones for the brokerage division of CSRisks.
Visit with existing agents to solidify relationships and grow book of business.
Manage book of business from submission to policy issuance.
Establish relationships with underwriters and carriers.

education_certification.credential: Four-year college degree or equivalent in work experience in risk management, business administration, or related field (4 years of insurance experience required)
